`c_etc` varchar(255) COMMENT '비고', `c_desc` text COMMENT '설명', `c_contents` longtext COMMENT '내용'
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_bin COMMENT='요구사항 상태 테이블 로그';
